name: Tobud
description:
A platformer where you play as Tobud, meeting others along the way. What lies at the end of their journey?

This is a game that I made for one of my classes! It's the first time I've used Unreal. All of the assets in the game was either a default thing in Unreal or made by me: models, textures, animations, and music! All the sound effects should be from FreeSound.

Socials if you'd like to check those out.

  • https://www.instagram.com/zeno_phu/
  • https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW7CUNucOmt9JWoWoOs_Apw
  • https://www.twitch.tv/zenobard_
